website_summaries.verdict: This hand vacuum comes with a long cord and good suction, so it's perfect for cleaning upholstery and stairs.
pros: Easy to empty the dust cup
Hose adapter nozzle and 2-foot hose included
Long cord enables you to cover a large area
cons: Users say it is difficult to clean the filter when it gets clogged

customer_reviews.title: It works great on sucking up dog hair off of furniture and ...
customer_reviews.text: Researched multiple, reputable consumer reviews for handheld vacs and this little number was consistenlty in the top running against some high-end competitors (think your Dysons and Mieles). It works great on sucking up dog hair off of furniture and its light weight makes for easy cleaning up for dustboards, walls, crevices etc. I appreciate the long cord - I wanted a corded - as it makes getting around easy. Additionally, it's super easy to clean. Haven't needed to use a lot of the attachements, but appreciate that they were included. At time of purchase, Amazon had the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Noss

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME for pet hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this product for cleaning my cats hair off from our black couch (though it looks gray in pictures). Well, I’ll let the pictures speak for itself. Also put a video of my boyfriend trying it out so you can hear the noise it makes. For me, it makes less noise than our main vacuum and isn’t an issue whatsoever but when I read reviews people always seem concerned about noise levels haha. It didn’t take long and it really did a fantastic job. Haven’t tried the other attachments yet or for other purposes, or had it for more than a day so I’ll update if anything other than pure amazingness happens but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inferior to Cordless Vacd
customer_reviews.text: I bought a corded hand vacuum instead of a cordless to make sure the suction was strong enough. As it turns out, this corded vac is weaker than both cordless ones I've owned. The reviews blow my mind. Look to other brands for a functional handvac.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Tulien

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: i turned it on for the first time and there is smoke coming out of it and it doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: Gena

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I got this mainly for the main room&bathroom. I have a dyson v8 which is AMAZING, but because i use the strongest suction setting, the battery does not last long. So i got this for one of the rooms and a bathroom imbetween using the dyson and its perfect. I mainly got it for my hair, which is very long. It sucks it up quite well! Definitely a good option for an inexpensive vacuum and very lightweight! The super long cord is a plus because it reaches every part of the room and even to the bathoom.
customer_reviews.author: iEatBBQ

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product! I bought it to clean my stairs and car, it doesn’t do the job at all, falls apart sometimes, don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Senad Mustafic

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching for an efficient vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Wish I didn’t purchase this vacuum. The suction was weak and the attachments aren’t practical. The clip on the top broke the second time I took it apart for cleaning. Keep browsing for a different vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: IT STOPS WORKING AFTER 1YEAR USAGE OF 7 TIMES..
customer_reviews.text: What a total waste, ive had this product march 30 2019 ... I HAVE LITERALLY USED IT 7 TIMES to clean my vehicle in 1 year ,..i clean the filter before usage a couple days ago , while i was using it , it worker for about 10mins in the car and then i stopped it cuts of no power at all device did not overheat or no electrical issues to my knowing, also i had it pluged on to house115v current plug outlet..which is normal amout for fans, tvs etc.... where i live it will cost a fraction of the price i paid to ship it back..
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Maraj

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for more than a year now. It is very reliable and it does the job of cleaning down-below on the boat. The various attachments don't store on the unit itself, so I keep them in the original box. I have replaced the filter just once so far. The manufacturer's filter was very expensive, but a four-pack of generics on Amazon was much more reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great handy home vacuum for quick chores!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing convenience and suction for the money. The usual issues associated with bagless dirt disposal (solved with the addition of an adapted pair of discount nylons to trap the dust inside the unit and act as a makeshift collecting bag),but it has already made short work of dog hair, cat dander, spilled gardening seeds and even very small pieces of broken glass. Strong and relatively quiet, the long cord which is everything I need to, it stores away easily back into the original box and takes up very little space. Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Literary Picks

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped work in 4 months. It is ridiculous that it would just stop functioning after such a short period of time. Of course it is no longer eligible for return. I use this rather infrequently but yet after 4 months it stopped middle of cleaning my apt and wouldn't turn back on.
customer_reviews.author: Saina S.

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend. Returned.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this so much, after doing lots of research for the perfect handheld vacuum. It blows air on both sides which makes it extremely hard to vacuum pet hair from a leather couch. No use of pulling out a vacuum if it will only blow pet hair everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 German shepherds and a ton of dog hair. This did absolutely nothing to pick up hair off furniture. I vacuum daily and get my dogs groomed regularly. I just wanted this to do the couch from stray hairs. This was unable to handle even light duty. Already donated it to a household without pets...hope they have better luck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice handheld vac, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Most of the features of this little gem are positive as indicated in my ratings. The only downsides are when doing stairs, to get the the crevices you must point the unit straight in which limits the coverage; and the filter is a bit hard to clean. The long cord is nice, but it's about the same as the dirt devil I replaced. Suction is very good and it does a nice job on pet hair which was my main objective since we have 5 cats and two dogs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wade

customer_reviews.title: small size / BIG POWER
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small vacuum for my #vanlife van - 86 sq. feet isn't much so anything you store inside needs to be small, efficient, and functional. I was completely skeptical that something this small would work - most hand-held car vacs have pathetic suction so when I came across this, I almost skipped right away. The reviews were mixed - but I took a chance and upon first use, could not believe how powerful it was. Not sure what the issues were for the 1 - 2 star reviews, but as long as it keeps working, this thing is 5 star all the way!
customer_reviews.author: hgpilot - MM

customer_reviews.title: Not what I Expected
customer_reviews.text: This sweeper picks up dirt decently but cleaning this vacuum after a small amount of cleaning is difficult. The dirt/fuzz stick in the filter and it is not cleanable. You have to change the filter often. Also, this is very hard to put back together. I trusted the reviews and I wish I wouldn't have purchased this item. Not effective for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: BOWCOW

customer_reviews.title: So you think your gonna save a buck...
customer_reviews.text: Not this time. I bought this on Amazon under the like new category with the description only saying scratch on top in oringal package. How when I got it , I cleaned it, and noticed that the filter looked gross and moldy. Wow, so I thought I was gonna save a buck buying it this way. But how did they over look listing this dirty moldy filter. Not cool. Now I gotta buy another filter. There goes the savings. I should of just new. Oh well you live and learn. Hopefully it works as good as its said it should. Havent tested it yet on a serious cleaning yet. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little vacuum! Exhaust air is not a big problem
customer_reviews.text: A number of folks have complained about the exhaust air on the reviews here, so I hesitated to buy this little vacuum, but I listened to the other reviewers who said as long as you use the extension there is no problem. I'm so glad I purchased this! It's powerful, has a great long cord, and so small and cute, it's doesn't feel like a burden to store or get out of the closet. As a result, I use it more, rather than lug the bigger ones out. I highly recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Wells M. Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Picks Up Hair Easily
customer_reviews.text: To save money, hubby and I cut each other's hair most of the time. The rubberized textured nozzle is marvelous. Very pleased with it where we cut our hair and also in the carpeted stairwell. Plenty of power and easy to empty in addition to being able to see how full it is. Long cord very helpful. As people say, it has a strong exhaust, so either connect the hose or watch what direction you are vacuuming (although it doesn't scatter hair far). It's as handy as it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well in small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad I got it. I don't have stairs in my house, but I love how I can get in small spaces with it. My regular vacuum is hard for me to manage in small spaces even with the attachments. Since my bedroom is a bit small, I can maneuver around the head of the bed and other cramped spaces without difficulty. I really like how easy it is to dump the dust and care for it. I guess if I were to use it for my car I would use an extension cord, but the cord is long enough to get all around where I need it, like the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Hand Vac
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of buying cordless hand held vacuum cleaners, as the last two suffered premature battery failure. That, and they don't seem to have the suction power of corded models. The best thing about this vac is the long cord. Suction is very good, and it comes with a variety of attachments along with a hose connection option. The filter is quite elaborate, and cleaning the filter takes a few minutes after every couple of uses. Overall, we are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BarryJ

customer_reviews.title: RV motorhome must have!
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing a motorhome, I purchased a battery operated black and decker hand held vacuum since having electric sites is not always a possibility. What a waste of money! While it did suck up our labrador's dog hair, it lasted maybe 3 minutes; not even enough time to vacuum the small loveseat, let alone any carpets. After researching, and learning that one can run an electric cleaner when the generator is on, I choose this one, based on other reviews. Omg, it's the best. Great suction, very long cord and of course it runs until I'm done. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Gramaneen

customer_reviews.title: Preferred my Eureka Easy Clean
customer_reviews.text: When our old Eureka Easy Clean hand vac finally died after a good long life, my eldest son requested we get a lighter weight handheld vacuum. After shopping around, I decided to try this Bissell and regret my choice. I don't think it cleans the stairs nearly as well and it definitely doesn't pack up as tidily. My 14 year old insists it's better because it's not as heavy, but then, he's not very picky about how well the stairs are Actually Cleaned ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks (in a good way - sry not original)
customer_reviews.text: Pro: It has some serious suction. Picks up dog hair really well. That said, it's pretty noisy, and as another reviewer mentioned, the vents on the side can blow stuff around before you get to it. One reviewer had some handy mods with duct tape and cardboard to divert the flow up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Z

customer_reviews.title: not worth it...
customer_reviews.text: I would never purchase this again...very disappointed...had a hand held Eureka that picked up much more...I use this for my second floor steps and steps to basement...picks up very little..probably because it has no rotating brushes...I would like to throw it out but it hurts me to be so wasteful.. will probably use it a few more times and then when I'm really done with it donate it to Goodwill.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great, little powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, little powerhouse! It does a great job picking up pet hair from furniture (my main reason for purchasing) and small jobs like cleaning area carpets. It really has excellent suction. As other reviewers noted, the unit does seem to get hot very quickly, so I make a habit of only using it for a few minutes at a time to avoid overheating the motor. Other that that, it seems like it's built well and will be relatively durable if used properly. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: annie_0627

customer_reviews.title: Lordy!  This thing is POWERFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: I have animals and they have hair and they shed year-round. I bought the Bissell "Pet Hair Eraser" about a year ago and the lithium battery is good for only about 10 minutes before it needs a recharge. So I was looking for a corded hand-held vac to do all of the upholstered furniture and the carpeted stairway in one day. I FOUND IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Beckler

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is a powerful handheld vacuum, perfect for my carpeted stairs. Pros: great suction, long cord length, easy to use. Cons: one of the pieces arrived broken and it was shipped in its own box,(no amazon cardboard box) not sealed at all, which may have contributed to the broken piece. Your best bet if you have a lot of pet hair is to sweep first and then vacuum, too much hair and it will clog easily.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Best hand vac for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: Never would think that a rubber front would be more efficient at grabbing pet hair then Shark's Pet power brush that often are included with their vacuums. This hand vac is amazing at picking up pet hair on ANTHING, even cat towers. Have to grab the hair out between the rubber teeth frequently but better then it not getting picked up due to an inefficient brush. Plus, Bissel is amazing to work with to acquire correct replacement accessories and filters so like to stick with Bissell vacuums. Rubber front will have to be replaced for do see it 'cracking' within several months with considerable use.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H.

customer_reviews.title: Really Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these in one month. The impeller blades crash on the first use. Really terrible product. I feel conned. The reviews are a farce. I even have a video of it crashing. The first time I thought it crashed because of poor use, bought a second one and it crashed just the same
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Yellow one
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to tackle stairs and upholstery with animal hair for my cleaning business. This is my favorite new toy. The rubber nozzle is PERFECT. I chose the yellow one instead of the pink “pet hair” one, because everything looked the same except the yellow cord was longer and had a few more attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Britt J.

customer_reviews.title: Great vac for dog hair
customer_reviews.text: I’m a dog owner and I bought this vacuum to clean dog hair off furniture carpet dog beds and car interior and it does all of those things very well. I was especially pleasantly surprised by how well this vacuum sucked up the dog hair and everything else in my car quickly and easily. And that was using the rubber nozzle for pet hair, I haven’t tried the other attachments yet. This is a great product and deserves the good reviews it has gotten.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Does what needs to be done
customer_reviews.text: Bought to help combat dog hair on furniture and rugs. Works great! Only complaint is that if I try to use it to get stuff off of a hard surface, the air coming out the sides blows it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Busby

customer_reviews.title: Extra long cord
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum is amazing! I keep it in my garage for using on the car and it works perfectly every time. The extra long cord means I can plug it in to the garage door and keep the car outside of the garage! The attachments are ok - I tend to only use one of them and the basic vacuum itself. The vacuum has a lot of power and tends to pick up all of the dirt, etc. inside the car with only 1-2 passings. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JenMTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hair on Furniture!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been shedding like crazy lately! I was going crazy trying to keep up with the amount of hair she is losing. I found this vacuum when I was desperate for a way to remove the fur from my sofa. This product worked incredibly well and was quicker than using a regular vacuum because I didn’t have to continue to go over the same areas to pick up more hair like you would with a regular vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: johns285

customer_reviews.title: So far, love it for our cars and couch!
customer_reviews.text: Only had this for a couple months but so far we really like it for cleaning our cars and getting pet fur, etc off our couch. The one thing I will caution against is wrapping the cord around the body of the vacuum... the cord will push on the button that releases the dust storage cartridge and then it falls off and makes a huge mess. This is only a problem if you forget and wrap the cord around the vacuum itself, otherwise haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Flyingairhead

customer_reviews.title: Great vac! Yes
customer_reviews.text: Great vac! Yes, I know you are supposed to use a cordless vacuum! Well call me old fashioned but the new cordless vacs have very little power and the battery life is almost zero. I bought a brand name cordless with little power and used it maybe six times before the battery was useless. Is this a way to sell replacement batteries? No thanks! I bought this great corded Bissell with great attachments and plenty of power. It should outlive me and still be working great!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I just got this little vacuum last week. The more I use it the more I like it. With the crevice tool it gets the stuff in tight places very well. It has plenty of strong suction. It got dog hair I couldn’t even see until it was in the collection bin. I just did under my heater registers and it did a fine job. Also, the baseboards. I can recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin Rueben

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction, but...
customer_reviews.text: As many stated, be ready to take a break when it gets hot! So plan your cleaning accordingly. Otherwise, the little machine has really good suction power; it was ok for picking up my short hair Pitt's hair, but it left some behind, so had to go over it a couple of times. The other issue was the red velvet strips attached to the wide mouth tool came right off on the first use, which is why I think it didn't pick up the dog's hair as good.
customer_reviews.author: Carla F.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really great little powerful vacuum cleaner. Just what I wanted & needed. Small storage requirement and powerful performance. Plus the attachments are great. Very recommended for regular usage around the house. Don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: gmoney

customer_reviews.title: Bought in July '19, Died in Oct '20
customer_reviews.text: I bought this corded handheld Bissell, thinking that it would outlast the battery of any rechargeable vacuum, which can last years and years. Well, it just barely made it out of the 'one year warranty' window. The hose was an asset. Wished it had a brush attachment. It was also very loud, but had good suction. Pros and Cons on this vacuum. Truly did not have a hard life, but when I saw sparks in the motor compartment and it started sounding sick, I retired it to the garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Holly D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to vacuum for all the dust bunnies, crumbs, and hair on the floor and bunched up near the walls. We have tile and vinyl flooring, so the dust and debris is a constant. This vacuum is easy to use and has become the vacuum that my kids use to help clean up during chore time. Good suction, easy for small hands to carry and handle.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Mom

customer_reviews.title: I bought this vacuum for our fifth wheel RV because ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum for our fifth wheel RV because it was said to be small and powerful. It is small and powerful, but it is also light to carry and operate. I seldom write a review, but this vacuum is just right for a camper, I was impressed with it's rug attachment. It was flexible with lots of little knobs on it's surface that dig into the rug and pop dirt out. Bissell engineered this mighty mouse just right!
customer_reviews.author: Russell C.

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum has good suction power and will make small cleaning jobs a chinch. The vacuum is not rechargeable and comes with a nice long cord to help tackle most small messes. This vacuum is also great for automobiles. This is a dry vacuum and cannot vacuum up wet messes. Highly recommended especially if you’re not into rechargeable vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: KM152

customer_reviews.title: Poor area of suction
customer_reviews.text: Needs better attachments, and just isn't great for cleaning much at once. Also, things fall out the hose extension when used, so they go right back out after sucking.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Warner

customer_reviews.title: Sucks up cat litter!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a vacuum that sucks up kitty litter!!! Even sucks it up out of carpet! Really satisfied with this purchase and think it is a good deal at this price. Was debating between this Bissell and the other that is simply for hair. The various attachments and hose make this a much better choice and it picks up hair pretty good too, although I have a dog whose hair weaves into the carpet... Nothing gets it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry I. Honsinger

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product.
customer_reviews.text: My second one of these and I love it. The first one failed but that was my fault with what I tried to clean up. Easy to use, handy. I use in on furniture, in the pet room, for quick pre company pickup of pet hair on steps and in corners, and to vacuum car. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: some replacement parts may not be available.
customer_reviews.text: The flat attachment stripping pulled off in two days. I ordered a new one from the factory. An upholstery attachment is not available for this unit. The cord outlet is on the bottom and keeps the unit from sitting up. Will investigate other brand attachments to see if they work. Otherwise a good little unit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Probably one of the Best purchases I've made on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I received my Bissell hand vac the other day and I have to say, this thing is fantastic! I bought it mainly to vacuum out the interior of my car and it did not disappoint. Not only did it take me less time than if I would have brought my car to a gas station and used one of their commercial vacuums, but it worked even BETTER than those vacs. This thing picked up every bit of dirt, sand, gravel, rocks, leaves, salt packets, pennies, gum wrappers, you name it, quickly and completely. Extremely satisfied with this machine and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Good suction if you keep the filter clean
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has good suction. The only downside is the filter fills up quickly and needs to be cleaned frequently. I guess that is a good problem to have with a vacuum, I am glad I bought it. I have tried to put a piece of paper towel in front of the filter and that is easier to clean, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Unsuspecting Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet fur!
customer_reviews.text: The suction power is great! The cord length is a good length. I have two cats and I vacuum the couch often. So I use the default rubber attachment, I use both hands to vacuum. It feels a little odd, but it does a GREAT job at picking up the cat fur. One thing too, when I’m vacuuming the fur, the air vents is blowing out so much air. It will cause the fur to fly around. A little unfortunate, but I can always come back and use the other attachments to get the rest of the fur. I mainly got this vacuum for pet fur.
customer_reviews.author: Geejay

customer_reviews.title: Though she be but little, she is fierce
customer_reviews.text: I had just used my upright attachments on the stairs the day before getting this. I still took it for a test drive. Oh my god, I should be ashamed of myself. I could have made a whole new cat with what came from the dust cup. It’s very small, but extremely powerful. The air vent does get pretty hot pretty quickly, but I accept that because it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SUCTION - POWERFUL FOR A HAND-HELD VAC
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hand-held vac to keep my small bathroom floor free of hair and kitty tracking. It's been doing an amazing job. I now use it for so many other reasons. I actually use it to do the final run on my carpets because my upright vac doesn't do as good a job as this little vac does. If Bissell makes an upright as good as this hand-held, I'd like to know about it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Sabia

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, quality.  Especially nice as a car vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: I got this exclusively for car cleaning. It does an excellent job and feels like a quality device. The suction is surprisingly powerful. It doesn’t get all pet hair. I found that no vacuum made will get all hair. It gets the ones that are parallel to the fabric but if the ends have stabbed into the weave so the hair is perpendicular to the fabric then sticky rollers are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Knighton

customer_reviews.title: Great For Small Vacuuming Jobs
customer_reviews.text: This handheld vacuum is great for small jobs, such as vacuuming a staircase or a small area rug. It's also great for windowsills and pet-related cleanup (cat hair, stray cat litter, etc...). Suction is plentiful, and the 18' cord allows for great flexibility and mobility. The default rubber tip is great for loosening up cat hair, and the hose and attachments work great. The only caveat is that the filter chamber needs to be emptied frequently, and the filter clogs with cat hair quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Bish

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is one amazing vacuum. A friend has two and after using hers I purchased one. There is so much power is great. I've sucked up 3/4" pieces of grout why are shavings copper pieces of wire screws can't say enough positive about this little vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Kirt S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never written a review so quickly, but THIS IS A MAGICAL VACUUM. I have 6 cats, and 2 dogs (yeah, I know, I’m crazy) and vacuuming the steps was such a chore, with my big clunky vacuum. This is so small, light, and comfortable to hold. The chamber looks small, but I was able to vacuum two flights of steps with room to spare, before I had to empty it. The suction is strong, and it got everything! I’ve already told all of my animal-owning friends about it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren McCulley

customer_reviews.title: Nice little hand held vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Bought this little vacuum to use on 100 percent looped wool stairs. It works really well with one of the non-abrasive attachments. The suction was just the right amount, it was not to heavy for me, and the air blowing on the side was not an issue. I had read about this in another review, so that was something that prepared me prior to using mine. Wonderful to have this for the stairs and some other smaller hard to reach places. Finally, the perfect hand held vacuum that does not require charging, easy to empty, option to wash the internal hepa filter or simply replace it when necessary. Would recommend this lovely tool for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Great  hand held vacuum
customer_reviews.text: suction is great - I like the different accessories that came with it- I brought a different hand held vacuum before purchasing this one and it sucked- this one, vacuums like a large vacuum but smaller - I would definitely buy this one again -
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating filter
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Bissell products and been very pleased but this is a very flimsy set up on the filter. It is very difficult to get it back in position once you empty your canister and the filter is an extremely snug fit and then it does not want to attach the compartment back. If I had used it earlier I would have returned it
customer_reviews.author: Caffie

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again!
customer_reviews.text: While this did pick up good, it's a pain taking out the filter and cleaning. Had to struggle to get it back on and finally, I just threw it in the trash can. Way to much a pain to remove the cover and filter to clean and put back on.
customer_reviews.author: diddy

customer_reviews.title: This vac really sucks!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is awesome for its size! It is very lightweight, and great for quick cleanups. Just be aware that it does not have a large dust bin capacity. Much better than the rechargeable units. It has a very long cord too.
customer_reviews.author: Rhinin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Suction
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Suction Power. Bought for crevice hose and electric cord plug in, felt it would have more power as an outlet plug in, and it does. I was doubting this purchase and I was completely wrong excellent little vacumm.
customer_reviews.author: 100% DOMINANCE PROMINENCE

customer_reviews.title: Bissell Hand Held Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: My daughter borrowed my little vacuum and liked it so much that she put it on her Christmas list. She says the plug-in model has much better suction than her battery powered one and I agree with her. It is lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: pamela carroll

customer_reviews.title: Used, faulty product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived used and dirty with loose parts in a damaged box. It’s covered in small scratches and scuffs (see photos). I’m extremely disappointed to receive a used vacuum for the price of a new one. There also seems to be a major design flaw with the vacuum itself- the side vents blow air more forcefully than the actual vacuum suctions. I miss my Eureka Easyclean :(
customer_reviews.author: Annie Bee

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased this first.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my hobby shop to pick up sawdust and it sucks like a hurricane. I would have liked to have been able to attach it to a wall, but no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Renshaw

customer_reviews.title: Dust catch porely designed.
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum works well enough, but the dust catch is designed poorly it won't stay on with the filter in place. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pet owner?  GET THIS.
customer_reviews.text: If you have pets and carpeted stairs you must get this little workhorse! It is perfect- weighs virtually nothing, powerful suction, rubberized intake that snags pet hair, a cord that doesn’t require you to switch outlets halfway through: in short, it works miracles.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Resolution: clean house better! I am very satisfied with this little machine. Im using it for carpeted stairs, and for removing cat hair from the sofa. I‘ve had a lot of cleaning appliances, I highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: pickybouteverything

customer_reviews.title: Great Suction and Easy to Use.
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought it for our car and our house to vacuum up the little stuff. Great inside on hard floors to get what the swiffer doesn’t. We run it along the edges of furniture and along the baseboards. Spotless. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dodger

customer_reviews.title: OK for light touch ups; not good for carpets
customer_reviews.text: Not very effective on carpet. Works fine on floors, but there is no “on” switch. You have to hold the switch in the on position for it to operate, and that can be pretty tiring for my finger to constantly hold that thing down while I’m trying to vacuum! It does well to pick up loose hair, dust bunnies, etc., but only if they are on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Kalamazoo Gal

customer_reviews.title: Really excellent vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best handheld vacuum I have owned. It is SO much more powerful than any cordless model I have tried. The price is really good too. Well worth every penny and I am so happy with this purchase. I have a cat and child who drops crumbs everywhere so we need this!
customer_reviews.author: Val Hower

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for stairs and for the car. The suction is INCREDIBLE! I was skeptical at first as it didn't have active beater bars, but the surface is made so you can scrape it against the carpet and it REALLY picks stuff up. I'm VERY pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Sooraj

customer_reviews.title: It worked great at first and is easy and lightweight to handle
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a few years ago. It worked great at first and is easy and lightweight to handle. However, the suction is barely noticeable now. It has only been used for stairs and it has been regularly emptied, so it has not been over used. Despite the favorable reviews, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James William

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Obviously it doesn't have as much suction as my upright, but this is a godsend for stairs! So much easier than even taking the canister off my upright and using the hose. So happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: bellewithab

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty
customer_reviews.text: I needed something small but powerful to clean the stairs; this Bissell did the job! Not only was the suction better than I expected (great, in fact), the cord is long enough to be plugged in at the top of the stairs and reach the bottom. I am delighted with this little unit. And, it came with attachments. What a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Christy DeBoe Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Hand Held Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Dyson hand held ( Battery no cord ) which failed to work after one year. I decided to go with a cord this time and the Bissell filled the bill ! The long cord and extra power, was so much better then the EXPENSIVE Dyson hand held. I will be buying another to keep downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister since she just got her first cast, she loves it. Originally I bought her a cheap $30 one and she said it couldn’t even do its job.. suck. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: First off, it was delivered in one day.... Awesome... I was a little skeptical at how small it was and how it would perform ... I have four cats and first wanted to see how it performed on an area rug in the living room ... I was blown away at how much cat hair came out of rug and how powerful that little vacuum is... FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and man is it powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! This thing has massive suction power and works great on pet hair. I have a golden retriever and 3 long hair cats and I was shocked at how well it picked up hair. Even when I thought there wasn’t any more to pick up. This is a must have for pet owners!
customer_reviews.author: Moe shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I had another one like this of same brand and used that one for a few years, unfortunately i lost it hose and attachments. It cleans my mini van real good as i drive uber so its always a mess on the mats, but this beast helps.
customer_reviews.author: Inayat

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is such a handy little vacuum. The rubber attachment works wonders on my couch to remove stubborn dog hair. And the other attachments are handy when cleaning smaller spaces - in the car, between cabinets, under the fridge ( all of the places that a normal upright vacuum might miss). The bin is easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog hair on couches
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great for me! Mainly use this for the stairs and to get the dog hair off the couch, I plan on using it for my car too. I love how well it works getting dog hair off our couch, I use the rubbery nozzle for that and it does the trick! Seems to have good suction for a small handheld vacuum and am very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC VACUUM!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic vacuum for the affordable price! It's a little smaller than I expected but it still worked wonderfully! Very strong suction and picks up all of my cats hairs and stray litter with ease! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: n9phuo

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my steps. I hated lugging a big sweeper up and down them. The cord is pretty long which is nice. It comes with several attachments. I personally love the rubber attachment because it really picks up the dog hair. It is a powerful sweeper for being so small. It picks up dog hair better than my shark vacuum does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars - exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is an absolute beast. It's durable, easy to move around, and so very powerful. The dirt chamber is easy to empty and put back on. This thing sucks pet hair off of hard wood surfaces from quite a distance! The only thing this vacuum hasn't been able to pick up are my insecurities-- but to be fair, there are a lot of them and nothing has been able to move them for quite a few years. I highly recommend this to anyone! I use it on stairs, to dust, eat cobwebs, and more!
customer_reviews.author: August

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely amazed at this thing. I've been battling cat hair for many years and never have I ever experienced an easier way. Just one pass thru got every piece of cat hair off my micro fiber sofa in seconds. I didn't use the attachments because I use my regular vacuum for other jobs. I purchased this strictly for cat hair. I absolutely recommended this to pet owners!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this little gadget for my car, the house stairs, and here and there where it is difficult to get around with my traditional upright vacuum. The attachments are super! The one head has a beater bar which I use on the stairs, and the other I use most has a rather pointed nozzle for crevices and hard to reach spaces. The power is excellent! I have had this for over a year, and do not regret buying it for a moment. I highly recommend. I did purchase the Bissell Pet Pack Vacuum Attachment set for this and am very happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Moffett

customer_reviews.title: Handheld Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I am getting older and this is great for the stairs. We have two dogs and two cats. Picks the hair up just fine. One draw back. The exhaust blows out in front. But maybe they will change this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've had various dust busters and small vacuums over the years, and usually they don't have a strong suction and don't last very long. This, however, is my second purchase of this vacuum, I just bought for my dad after he tried and loved mine. It's great for little jobs, like vacuuming steps or vertical blinds or small messes. My original one is still going strong after a few years. My dad probably uses this daily, he's retired and cleans a lot, and his is still going strong too. When either of ours breaks, we will likely purchase another one of these!! Sorry, old dust buster that couldn't actually bust dust, you've been replaced.
customer_reviews.author: A. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: The best pet vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this vacuum. I have two dogs and a cat and it easily takes the hair off the couch and whatever else I need to vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Kudos to the design team who came up with this.
customer_reviews.text: At last, an innovative solution to picking up pet hair. The rubber nozzle works like those rubber sponges and brushes sold for pet hair removal. No more brushes for the hair to get tangled up in. This powerful little vacuum puts my expensive upright vacuum to shame. Easy to operate and change nozzles. Just be sure you are outdoors and standing upwind when you empty the cup and beat the filter to clean it. The Bissell Cleanview picks up so much dust that tapping the filter releases a big cloud of it.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Magoo

customer_reviews.title: The vacuum does exactly what it's advertised for.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a powerful, lightweight, handheld device for use on stairs, in cars, on furniture, on blinds. The vacuum is easy to clean thoroughly. All in all this vacuum is well-built and useful for a variety of jobs that an upright vacuum would not be able to do.
customer_reviews.author: NDEresearcher

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE SUCTION
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum does not perform well at all, I'm so disappointed in my purchase. More so, I'm mad at myself for allowing the 30 day return deadline to slip right by me and now I'm stuck with a useless handheld vacuum that doesn't suck up a darn thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a screan and a filter and after almost 2 years still havent needed to replace the HEPA filter. Not suitable for huge cleanups as it gets clogged quickly by design. Great for food particles from kids.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Handy little cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cute little vacuum cleaner for our RV. It has a nice long cord and it light weight and easy to use and to maintain. No problems so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S. Reppert

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little machine. I would have preferred a cordless one but the cord on this one is long and works MUCH better than any cordless vac I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Brady’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: It’s a lot of power I’m very happy with My little vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: These little vacuum is wonderful I love it it’s like using a regular vacuum cleaner use more closet under the bed everywhere I’m very happy thank you
customer_reviews.author: bertha

customer_reviews.title: The perfect car cleaning buddy!
customer_reviews.text: Small, lightweight and yet powerful. Allows you to crawl around your car and get into tight spaces for a deep clean! Before getting this, I would need to lug my house vacuum into the garage and keep the canister outside while trying to get the hose to reach every nook and cranny. No only could I not get them, but I'd have to move the cannister to each doorway to make an attempt. Not with this guy. I just bring the cord in thru a window and go to town on my car! It's small and cheap enough to dedicate for car use and keep in the garage! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Tech Geek Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great for Stairs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use on carpeted stairs. Has an extra long cord so it works from the top of the stairs to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph L. Jensen

product_meta.title: Bissell Cleanview Deluxe Corded Handheld Vacuum, 47R51
product_meta.description:
Color:Orange Deluxe Corded| Style:VacuumThe BISSELL CleanView Deluxe Corded Hand Vacuum provides a powerful and convenient way to clean your home and car. It is ideal for use on upholstery, stairs, and other hard-to-reach areas. Includes specialized attachments to tackle all kinds of messes.

AMAZON.COM


BISSELL CLEANVIEW DELUXE CORDED HAND VACUUM, 47R5

The BISSELL CleanView Corded Hand Vacuum provides a powerful and quick way to clean up throughout your home. It is ideal for use on upholstery, stairs, and other hard to reach areas. Included are several attachments to effective tackle all kinds of messes.
FEATURES:
 * 
 * Powerful: Powerful suction for thorough cleaning of upholstery, stairs, or other areas of the home
 * 
 * Convenient & Versatile: Easily clean up messes wherever they happen - great for use in your car or RV too
 * 
 * Cleaning Attachments: Hose attachment and tools make cleaning hard to reach areas easy
 * 
 * Dirt Container: Large, clear dirt cup so you can easily see when it's time to empty
 * 
 * Flexible Rubber Nozzle: Great for removing dirt and hair on upholstery and stairs
 * 
 * 18 Foot Power Cord: Comes with cord wrap system
 * 
 * Additional Tools: Includes wide mouth tool, crevice tool, hose, and hose adapter tool




BISSELL STICK AND HAND VACUUM COMPARISON
Featherweight Vacuum, 3106

Lift-Off Floors & More, 53Y8

Lift-Off Floors & More PET, 53Y8-1

PowerEdge PET Hard Floor Vacuum, 81L2-T

Pet Hair Eraser Corded Hand Vac, 33A1

CleanView Deluxe Corded Hand Vac, 47R5

Pet Hair Eraser Cordless Hand Vac, 94V5-A

PRODUCT FEATURES & ATTACHMENTS
Great for quick clean-ups of everyday messes Cordless, 2-in-1 vacuum with powerful cleaning & convenience Cordless, 2-in-1 vacuum, perfect for homes with pets! Captures debris & pet hair along edges, in corners & tight spaces without attachments Designed for quick cleaning of pet hair and dry messes Powerful suction for quick, easy cleaning Powerful and convenient cordless hand vacuum designed for homes with pets Converts to Hand Vacuum Removable Hand Vacuum Removable Hand Vacuum with Pet Hair Nozzle Wipers made of pet hair-attracting material Includes Flexible Contour Nozzle & Hard Nozzle Flexible Contour Nozzle Integrated Crevice Tool with Pet Hair Nozzle Crevice Tool On/Off Brush Roll Lint Strip to Attract Pet Hair and On/Off Brush Roll Hose Adapter Nozzle Wall Mount/Table Top Charging Stand 2-Way Folding Handle for Compact Storage 2-Way Folding Handle for Compact Storage Hose and wide mouth tool LED Charging Light PRODUCT SPECS

feature_bullets: Dirt cup capacity - 0.78 liters. A powerful and convenient way to clean your home and car
Flexible rubber nozzle great for removing dirt and hair on upholstery, stairs, and in cars
Specialty cleaning attachments—includes hose, crevice tool, and wide mouth tool
Clean farther with the 18-ft. power cord
Easy to empty bagless vacuum cleaner

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,754 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
